person:
Olga Bernstein Kohlberg
<death when="1935-8-12/>
Preisdent
Charles Wolf Temple Emanuel as founded at Charles Wolf's house
Adolph Westerman Adloph Westerman was one of the founding members of Temple Emanuel and popular merchant in the Rio Grande Valley.
Sam Lack Sam Lack was one of the founding members of Temple Emanuel and prominent Israel Bonds advocate.
Benjamin Kowalski Benjamin Kowalski served as mayor of Brownsville in 1876.
Sophye Edelestein Mrs. J. Edelstein Mrs. Jacob Edelstein Sophye Edelstein was the Sunday School teacher at Temple Beth Israel and Temple Emanuel for many years and was involved in the Temple Emanuel Sisterhood and Hadassah.
